description: Pentagon partners with Elon Musk's xAI to deploy Grok AI across military systems, giving 3 million personnel advanced AI tools by 2026 for sensitive tasks.

description: Mexican Navy plane reportedly crashes near Galveston Causeway during medical mission, resulting in multiple fatalities as search and recovery efforts continue.

description: New York Times columnist Ezra Klein declares Trump's "vibe shift" is over after Democrats won key elections and voters expressed frustration over the economy.

title: Self-healing concrete? Buried Pompeii site reveals secret behind Rome's enduring structures
description: Archaeologists at a Pompeii site buried by the 79 AD eruption of Mount Vesuvius have uncovered evidence of ancient Roman concrete technology that could heal itself over time.

description: Chargers star linebacker Denzel Perryman will be missing the final two games of the regular season, as the NFL suspended him following a hit on a Cwboys receiver.

title: Exclusive Photos: JD Vance joins Navy SEAL training, pushes limits in grueling workout
description: Vice President JD Vance trains with Navy SEALs in grueling 90-minute workout, carrying logs and climbing obstacles. The Marine veteran says troops went easy on him.

description: CBS correspondent Sharyn Alfonsi was harshly critical of boss Bari Weiss for delaying her segment about a El Salvador prison where the Trump administration has sent illegal migrants.

title: 98 Minnesota mayors warn state fiscal policies are hurting cities, residents and local budgets
description: Nearly 100 Minnesota mayors united to challenge state fiscal policies, citing vanishing $18 billion surplus and looming deficit threatening local services.

description: ICE officers injured in violent encounter as Cuban migrant allegedly rams vehicles, strikes agents during arrest attempt in St. Paul. Two hospitalized.

description: Army veteran accused of violent break-in at billionaire's estate allegedly believed Katy Perry was controlling him during severe mental health crisis.

description: Three dangerous inmates escaped from DeKalb County Jail near Atlanta Monday. Authorities warn residents to avoid approaching the possibly armed fugitives.

title: Joy Reid doubles down on Erika Kirk attacks after TPUSA's AMFest jab
description: Joy Reid doubled down on comments against Turning Point USA President Erika Kirk after Kirk offered to hug Reid and touch her hair during AmericaFest 2025.

title: Congress flees town as health care premiums set to explode for millions of Americans in January
description: Congress failed to fix soaring health care premiums before leaving for recess, setting up a big political battle in 2026 as costs spike for millions.

description: The Justice Department tried and failed to secure charge against Comey and James for a second time, prompting the appeal.

description: The Steelers are set to be without star receiver DK Metcalf for the remaining two regular-season games, as the league suspended him for his altercation with a Lions fan.

description: The Kansas City Chiefs announced a big move on Monday, relocating to Kansas with a new $4 billion domed stadium starting with the 2031 NFL season.

title: Trump unveils ‘Golden Fleet’ of Navy battleships, touts them as ‘more powerful than any' ever built
description: Trump administration elevates shipbuilding as critical national security priority amid warnings that China has 230 times U.S. naval production capacity.

title: Ohio kids as young as 8 steal car, lead police on chase crash into home, worried about Santa, presents: police
description: An 11-year-old driving a stolen car led Ohio police on a chase that ended with a crash, with the suspects telling officers they learned to steal cars from YouTube.

title: Judge blocks ICE from re-detaining Abrego Garcia – but signals ruling could come fast
description: Abrego Garcia's hearing ended with little new information — but plenty of harsh words from Judge Xinis.

description: China has reportedly loaded over 100 new intercontinental ballistic missiles into border silos, accelerating nuclear expansion faster than any other power.

description: Israeli officials slam 'biased' U.N. food security report on Gaza, citing increased aid deliveries. Analysis reveals disputed famine claims lack evidence.

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu seeks meeting with President Donald Trump as officials warn Iranian missile drills could cover surprise attack plans.

description: Father-son duo accused in Bondi Beach shooting allegedly created antisemitic manifesto with Islamic State ideology, Australian investigators reveal.

description: Russian Lt. General Fanil Sarvarov killed in Moscow car bombing as investigators suspect Ukrainian intelligence involvement in the deadly attack on Monday.

description: Terror attack in Australia exposes growing jihadist networks as security experts warn ISIS remains far from defeated despite recent government claims.

description: Iran executed a man convicted of spying for Israel's Mossad intelligence agency, accused of conducting over 200 spy missions across multiple cities, including Tehran.

title: Israeli diaspora minister says Australia should have seen 'writing on the wall' before terror attack
description: Israel’s Amichai Chikli said Australian officials overlooked rising antisemitism and extremist rhetoric ahead of the Bondi Beach Hanukkah attack, criticizing the focus on gun laws.

title: ISIS, Iran escalating global campaign against Jews, Israel spy chief says
description: Mossad Director David Barnea said Israel will pursue the Bondi attackers and those who sent them, warning Iran and ISIS are accelerating global plots against Jews.

description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese faced boos at a vigil for Bondi Beach shooting victims Sunday, as some 10,000 mourners gathered to honor those killed.

description: Peace talks between Russia and Ukraine reportedly proceed "constructively" in Florida even as deadly missile strike hits Odesa, killing eight people.

description: Australian hero who tackled Bondi Beach gunman receives $2.6M in donations in response to brave actions during deadly attack that left him wounded but praised globally.

title: Several elephants killed in train crash after impact causes multiple coaches to derail

description: Josh Frydenberg slams Anthony Albanese's government over rising antisemitic violence in Australia, warning years of inaction enabled extremism to flourish.

description: The U.S. leads talks with Egypt, Qatar and Turkey on Gaza ceasefire Phase 2, focusing on unified governance and regional integration for long-term stability.

title: Iran killing spree continues as regime sets new record for 2025 executions, dissident group says
description: Human rights crisis deepens as Iran's execution spree reportedly reaches unprecedented levels with over 2,000 prisoners killed so far this year by the Tehran regime.

title: Australian authorities release 7 men detained over possible violent plot in wake of Bondi Beach shooting
description: Seven men who were arrested due to concerns that they were planning a "violent act" were released. The arrests came days after the shooting at Bondi Beach.

title: Thousands gather as Bondi Beach reopens, commemorating victims of Hanukkah attack
description: Police reopened parts of Bondi Beach with thousands forming solidarity circle after mass shooting targeting Jewish community left 15 dead.

title: Trump says US 'has to have' Greenland after naming special envoy
description: Denmark warns Washington to respect its sovereignty, while Greenland says it will decide its own future.

title: US regulator approves pill form of Wegovy weight-loss drug
description: Wegovy becomes first pill of its kind to be approved, shifting weight-loss drugs beyond injections.

title: Russia escalates attacks on key Ukrainian region of Odesa
description: President Volodymyr Zelensky warned the attacks were an attempt by Moscow to block Ukraine's access to maritime logistics.

title: Wildfire-hit town wins €468m in Spain's Christmas lottery
description: The town of La Bañeza, which has a population of around 11,000, was badly affected by wildfires in the summer.

title: Trump says US is pursuing third oil tanker linked to Venezuela
description: The move comes days after the US president said that he was ordering a blockade of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.

title: Baby followed by BBC back in Gaza hospital after treatment abroad
description: The BBC revisits one-year-old Siwar Ashour who was temporarily evacuated to Jordan for medical treatment during the Gaza war.

title: Trump unveils plans for 'Golden Fleet' battleships named after himself
description: The US president has vowed to revive American shipbuilding after lagging behind China in naval capacity.

title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
description: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

title: NGOs fear Israel registration rules risk collapse of Gaza aid operations
description: International organisations not registered by 31 December face closure in Israel, but the Israeli government says aid delivery will not be affected.

title: Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow, officials say
description: Lt Gen Fanil Sarvarov is the third military official to have been killed in bomb attacks in the Russian capital over the last year.

title: Ecuadorean soldiers jailed for 34 years over boys' forced disappearance
description: The four boys were picked up by a military patrol and their bodies were later found mutilated and burned.

title: Élysée Palace staff member to stand trial over theft of precious tableware
description: Thomas M is accused of stealing solid silver and porcelain used for state banquets from France's presidential palace.

title: Thailand and Cambodia to hold ceasefire talks, says foreign minister
description: At least 41 people have been killed and nearly one million others displaced on both sides, officials said.

title: Gold and silver hit records as investors hunt for safety
description: Investors are flocking to precious metals amid geopolitical tensions and expectations of more US interest rate cuts.

title: Bondi gunmen 'meticulously' planned attack for months, police allege
description: Police release a tranche of documents allegedly tracing the suspects' movements prior to the deadly shooting.

title: Ghana official rejects 'Detty December' label
description: The term is widely used to describe Ghana and Nigeria's wild, end-of-year party seasons.

title: US lawmakers threaten legal action against Attorney General over Epstein files
description: On Monday, Senator Schumer said he would introduce a resolution to take legal action over the failure to release the full files.

title: Australian move to fast-track new gun and protest laws after Bondi shooting draws criticism
description: Civil liberties advocates say laws 'damage our democracy' while others say they scapegoat gun owners.

title: US and Ukraine call Miami talks productive despite no breakthrough
description: Donald Trump's special envoy, Steve Witkoff, issued a statement with the top Ukrainian negotiator after discussing the latest peace plans.

title: All pupils kidnapped from Nigeria Catholic school now free - officials
description: The authorities confirm the remaining students abducted in Niger state last month have been released.

title: Israel approves 19 new settlements in occupied West Bank
description: Far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said the move was about blocking the establishment of a Palestinian state.

title: Rights groups condemn new record number of executions in Saudi Arabia
description: At least 347 people have now been put to death this year, according to the UK-based campaign group Reprieve.

title: How Israel's grassroots hostage families group became a powerful international force
description: With just one hostage left in Gaza, members of the forum reflect on its influence in Israel and abroad.

title: What the underwhelming Epstein files release means for Trump and Maga
description: Conservative influencers were conspicuously silent following the latest release - but political danger remains for the president.

title: Screams for help and panic as tourists rescued from fatal Laos ferry disaster
description: People scrambled to safety as the ferry sank on the Mekong River, with a local woman and two children feared dead.

title: India's jobs guarantee scheme: A global model under threat?
description: India’s rural jobs guarantee, a global model, faces controversy as a new law reshapes the original scheme.

title: The showers and baths keeping data centre tech cool
description: Finding greener ways to keep giant new data centres cool is a challenge.

title: In rebel-held Myanmar, civilians face devastating air strikes and a sham election
description: The BBC goes to a rebel-held part of Myanmar, ahead of a government-mandated election starting this month.

title: Divided between two states, the town at the heart of America's abortion debate
description: The only abortion clinic in town is fighting an eviction notice and other efforts to shut it down.

title: Why Croatia's capital wants to hold Europe's best Christmas market
description: The festive events help to put cities on the map and attract millions of tourists.

title: Afcon is a special tournament, says Premier League star Iwobi
description: The Fulham midfielder will represent his birth country Nigeria in the competition featuring 24 nations.

title: Ros Atkins on… the oil tanker being pursued by the US
description: The BBC’s Analysis Editor Ros Atkins looks at what we know about the
of an oil tanker by the US Coast Guard off the coast of Venezuela.

title: Trump's appointment of Greenland envoy sparks fresh row with Denmark
description: The BBC's diplomatic correspondent James Landale explains how Trump's appoinment of a special envoy to Greenland has shaken diplomatic with Denmark.

title: Watch: Images, cassettes and high-profile figures from Epstein files
description: The partial release of documents includes photos of the late sex offender's properties, audio files and redacted documents.

title: Putin tells BBC Western leaders deceived Russia
description: BBC Russia editor Steve Rosenberg had the opportunity to ask Vladimir Putin about his plans for the future of the country.

title: What does TikTok's deal mean for America's users?
description: The BBC's Asia business correspondent says it is still unclear what sort of experience TikTok users in the US will get.

title: Trump unveils ‘Trump-class’ battleships for US Navy’s ‘Golden Fleet’
description: The US president says the new vessels will ensure naval dominance and include AI and laser technology.

title: ‘We have to have it’: Trump renews push for Greenland as Denmark protests
description: US president cites national security as rationale for his efforts to take control of the self-governing Arctic island.

title: Trump warns Maduro not to ‘play tough’ as Russia, China back Venezuela
description: Latest threat comes as US coastguard continues to pursue a third oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela.

title: Israel kills two Palestinians in Gaza City as ceasefire violations mount
description: Deadly attack comes as Gaza government media office says Israel violated ceasefire 875 times since it began in October.

title: Foster scores late goal as South Africa defeat Angola in their AFCON opener
description: Lyle Foster's match-winning 79th-minute strike allowed South Africa to win first opening match at AFCON since 2004.

title: Thailand and Cambodia agree to meet amid renewed cross-border fighting
description: Planned talks come as Southeast Asian leaders urge both countries to show 'maximum restraint' and return to dialogue.

title: Boxer Ty Mitchell tells Al Jazeera why he had to confront Tommy Robinson
description: Boxer Ty Mitchell told Al Jazeera why he had to confront far-right British activist Tommy Robinson.

title: Canada names new ambassador to US as key trade talks loom
description: Terms of North American free trade deal set to be renegotiated in 2026 under shadow of US tariff policies.

title: Deadly clashes break out in Aleppo between Syrian army, Kurdish-led SDF
description: At least two people have been killed in clashes between government forces and the Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces.

title: Ugandan police tear gas crowd at Bobi Wine campaign event
description: Footage shows police dispersing crowds with tear gas at rallies for Ugandan presidential candidate Bobi Wine in Kampala.

title: 130 Nigerian schoolchildren freed after mass abduction
description: A group of 130 Nigerian schoolchildren abducted last month were freed, ending a mass abduction that drew global concern.

title: Can diplomacy end the conflict between Thailand and Cambodia?
description: The neighbouring countries hold their first direct meeting in regional push for peace.

title: UPS stumbles into holiday season amid shifting trade rules
description: After the end of the de minimis rule rewired US import requirements, UPS is struggling to clear shipments.

title: Srebrenica: Genocide on Trial
description: The horrors of the Srebrenica genocide in Bosnia and Herzegovina and the war crimes trials that gave birth to the ICC.

title: Trump pauses more offshore wind projects citing national security concerns
description: The directive pausing five projects comes as the administration ramps up offshore oil and gas production.

title: Displacement camp running out of supplies for people fleeing Sudan’s war
description: Authorities say they don't have enough food, tents, and equipment to accommodate everyone fleeing Sudan’s war.

title: Sudan’s Darfur grapples with severe measles outbreak amid ongoing violence
description: MSF official tells Al Jazeera South Darfur hospital 'overwhelmed' by rapid increase in measles cases.

title: Turning Point USA held its AmericaFest conference. Here’s what happened
description: Turning Point USA's first AmericaFest without Charlie Kirk reveals ideological rifts within the conservative movement.

title: Ecuador soldiers sentenced to 34 years in prison for disappearing children
description: Sentencing caps yearlong investigation into abuse, disappearance of four children in Guayaquil amid crime crackdown.

title: Texas town battles nonstop noise from bitcoin mine
description: A rural Texas community says nonstop noise from a bitcoin mine is destroying their lives.

title: Cambodia-Thailand fighting continues as ceasefire talks loom
description: Fighting between Cambodia and Thailand continues despite talks, with communities facing fear and economic anxiety.

title: At least three killed in Israeli attack on southern Lebanon’s Sidon
description: Deadly Israeli air strike is latest in Israel's near-daily violations of 2024 ceasefire agreement with Hezbollah.

title: Illegal settlement expansion: How Israel is redrawing occupied West Bank
description: Israel's approval of 19 new settlements stands to redraw occupied West Bank, undermining prospect of two-state solution.

title: At least two killed in Aleppo clashes between Syrian army, Kurdish-led SDF
description: Violence comes as top Syrian and Turkish officials held talks on integrating SDF forces into Syria's new army.

title: Palestine Action hunger strikes: What are their demands?
description: As a months-long hunger strike persists, calls for immediate government intervention grow louder.
